rows.label: qst701302_msg0001
rows.name: You were here. I was looking for you.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0002
rows.name: You're the traveling performer's...?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0003
rows.name: What's wrong? Did something happen?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sorry to barge in so suddenly.
I thought it was urgent, so...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0005
rows.name:
It's fine. I'll listen, so you
don't have to be in such a hurry.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0006
rows.name: ...Thank you.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0007
rows.name:
Leon is gone. He probably went
to get the Rainbow Blossom.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0008
rows.name: Rainbow Blossom? What do you mean?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0009
rows.name: The truth is...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0010
rows.name:
...I thought if I said that, he
would give up. I never thought he
would actually go looking for it...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0011
rows.name:
My apologies. He gets fired
up when there's an obstacle.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0012
rows.name: You should have said that sooner!

rows.label: qst701302_msg0013
rows.name:
I don't really understand, but
does love have to be proven?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0014
rows.name:
...I just feel that to believe in something,
you need a basis for it. I can't just accept
it when someone suddenly talks about love.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0015
rows.name:
He falls in love easily, but
he's not the type to lie. He's
an idiot, just as you saw.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0016
rows.name: That's not what I mean...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0017
rows.name: Are you afraid? To trust people?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0018
rows.name: ...Is that wrong?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0019
rows.name: I didn't say that.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0020
rows.name:
I just thought that your true
feelings might lie elsewhere.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0021
rows.name:
So, is this Rainbow
Blossom really extinct?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0022
rows.name:
I don't know for certain... but
I've heard there's hope if it's in
a secret place somewhere in Iira.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0023
rows.name:
It used to bloom everywhere, but its
numbers decreased sharply due to
over-harvesting and environmental changes.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0024
rows.name:
I see. Then he's probably
aiming for that secret place.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0025
rows.name:
Is that man trying to
become an adventurer?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0026
rows.name:
I'm sorry our idiot has
caused you so much trouble.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0027
rows.name:
I really didn't mean
for this to happen...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0028
rows.name:
In any case, we'll search
for any leads. So,

rows.label: qst701302_msg0029
rows.name: please don't blame yourself too much.
